semantic_description: Database stored-procedure executions in CLM/eSign services are missing the stored-procedure name on their SQL client spans.

attributes_to_add.name: db.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the stored procedure name contained in SqlCommand.CommandText when CommandType == CommandType.StoredProcedure

attributes_to_add.name: db.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: the database name from the current SQL connection string
